name: VK Квадратные аватары (Anti Border-radius)
description: Убираем скругления аватаров и некоторых элементов страниц в вконтакте
css:
@-moz-document domain("vk.com") {
/*
@name         VK Квадратные аватары (Anti Border-radius)
@version      2.0.0
@namespace    userstyles.world/user/sitkiller
@description  Убираем скругления аватаров и некоторых элементов страниц в вконтакте
@author       KiLLeR
@license      No License
@Link         https://vk.com/killer_nsk
@Site         https://vk.com/killer_nsk
Release ver.  2.0.0 (17.10.2022):
*/

/*** Убираем скругления элементов ***/
.MediaGrid,
.module_body .people_cell_img,
.OwnerContentTabPhotosItem,
.OwnerVideosListItem__video,
.page_album_row,
.ProfileHeader,
.ProfileHeader__in,
.page_block,
.VideoCard__thumbWrapper,
.vkuiAvatar,
.vkuiGroup__inner,
.wall_module .wall_posts.own>.own~.own
{border-radius: 2px !important; 
--mg-border-radius-wrapper: 2px !important}

/*** Убираем скругления аватаров ***/
.apps_feed_user_photo,
.AvatarRich,
.bookmark_page_item,
.bookmark_page_item__image,
.bp_img,
.chat_tab_close,
.chat_tab_img,
.fans_fan_img,
.fans_idolph_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.fans_idolph_wrap,
.fc_contact_photo,
.fc_msgs_img,
.feed_friend_image,
.feed_friend_photo_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.feedback_img,
.feedback_row_answer .feedback_img,
.FlatButton,
.flist_item_thumb,
.friends_phonebook .friends_photo_img,
.friends_photo_img,
.friends_photo_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.group_row_img,
.group_row_photo,
.Home__photo,
.im_dialog_photo,
.im_grid,
.im_grid>img,
.im_peer_online,
.im-chat-input .im-chat-input--txt-wrap,
.im-chat-placeholder .im-chat-placeholder--img,
.im-chat-placeholder.im-creation--avatar._im_create_avatar,
.img.cell_img,
.im-page--dialogs,
.im-popular--avatar,
.im-prebody,
.like_share_ava.wdd_imgs,
.like_tt_image, 
.mail_box_single_ava .mail_box_single_ava_img,
.MediaGrid__imageOld,
.mention_tt_img,
.mention_tt_person_img,
.module_body .people_cell_img,
.mv_author_img,
.nim-dialog--content,
.nim-dialog--cw,
.nim-dialog--photo,
.nim-peer, 
.nim-peer.nim-peer_smaller,
.nim-peer--photo,
.nim-peer--photo>img,
.nim-peer--photo-w,
.notifier_image, 
.olist_item_photo,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_comm,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_mid,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_small,
.OwnerPageAvatar__underlay,
.owner_photo_preview100,
.owner_photo_preview50,
.page_cover,
.page_group_image,
.page_list_module .thumb,
.page_list_module,
.PhotoUpload,
.poll_tt_image,
.post_img, .post_field_user_image,
.profile_career_img,
.redesign_web .ui_rmenu_item, 
.right_list_img,
.search_item_img,
.search_row.ui_zoom_inner,
.settings_bl_photo,
.submit_post_box .thumb_off,
.submit_post_box .thumb_on,
.tag_frame_inner,
.top_notify_cont .feedback_img,
.top_profile_img, 
.TopNavBtn__profileImg,
.TopSearch__input,
.ts_contact_img,
.ts_input.text.ts_input,
.ui_ownblock_img,
.ui_zoom_inner,
.vkuiButton,
.voting_tt_image,
.wall_module .copy_post_img,
.wall_module .reply_img,
.wdd_img,
.wddi_img
{border-radius: 2px !important}
}
